word:
Good-bye. This must go to the office.--Letter 6a, 1880. 





Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
January 11, 1990. Entire Letter. 










                    MANUSCRIPT RELEASE NO. 1483 CONSISTS OF TWO E.G. WHITE 
              DOCUMENTS, LETTER 6A, 1880, AND LETTER 6B, 1880. THE SECOND 
              LETTER, LETTER 6B, 1880, IS DERIVED FROM THE FIRST LETTER, 
              LETTER 6A, 1880, BUT CONTAINS ADDITIONS, DELETIONS, AND 
              REWORDING, AS EDITED BY ELLEN WHITE FOR PUBLICATION IN THE 
              REVIEW AND HERALD OF JUNE 17, 1880.
